# topas

this is a lightweight testbed to test [superdough](https://github.com/tidalcycles/strudel/tree/main/packages/superdough) and [zyklus](https://github.com/felixroos/zyklus) without much else going on.

This project started as a poc to rewrite the scheduling of [topos](https://github.com/Bubobubobubobubo/Topos), but if you really want, here's an acronym that barely makes sense:

- *t*testbed
- *o*f
- *p*attern
- *a*gnostic
- *s*uperdough

## Examples

- [example 1](https://felixroos.github.io/topas/#)
